verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Captivate my heart
Let Your kingdom come
Establish there Your throne
Let Your will be done
